title: Improvement bonds exempt from taxation
context: ยง46-75 Improvement bonds exempt from taxation. All bonds issued by any of the counties of the State for improvements by assessments, and the interest thereon, shall be exempt from all state, county, and municipal taxation, except inheritance, transfer, and estate taxes. [L 1963, c 128, ยง1; Supp, ยง138-71; HRS ยง46-75]
